patchinfo.issue: VUL-0: quagga: Missing size check in bgp_dump_routes_func in bgpd/bgp_dump.c allowing DoS
patchinfo.name: quagga
patchinfo.description:
This update for quagga fixes the following issue:
Security issue fixed: - CVE-2016-4049: Fix for a buffer overflow error in bgp_dump_routes_func. (bsc#977012)
